name: Jailhouse Jack
description:
Love watching video clips? Love playing games? Now you can do both, SIMULTANEOUSLY!

JAILHOUSE JACK is an all-new game innovation from Donut Games, where you get to DIRECT YOUR OWN JAILBREAK MOVIE, direct the actors and even ROLL BACK TIME to undo mistakes.

Enjoy all the dynamite exploding fun of real movie making, with one big exception... Any mistake is reversible by a drag on the timeline. Because honestly, time traveling shouldn't be harder than hi-speed scrubbing an online video!

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

App Store placements early 2012:

### Top 100 Games USA ###
### Top 100 Games Canada ###
### Top 100 Games Scandinavia ###

- "Brilliant, inventive, addictive"
- "You'll have a hard time putting your iDevice down"
- "Donut Games has done it again"
- "iOS Game of the Day" -- MacWorld SE

Highlighted in "10 New App Store Games To Watch" by TouchMyApps

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

- 70 Scenes to direct and perfect
- Donut Games' famous 3-star ranking system: Increased replay value!
- Collectors Icon #30
- Game Center support
- Universal App (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch support)

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *

Enjoy another Donut Games release!
